text: Oh you must be a Hunter, and not from around here either. I'm Girlbert, a fellow outsider. Yharnam treats its guests... cruelly. I cannot stand even if I wished to, but I’ll help however I can. This town is cursed. Whatever brought you here… plan a swift exit.

Paleblood? I’ve never heard such a thing. But if it's blood you seek, try the Healing Church. They hold every secret of blood ministration. Across the valley lies the Cathedral Ward — birthplace of their sacred blood. Outsiders are rarely welcomed… yet tonight’s hunt may grant you passage.

The great bridge is the only path to the Cathedral Ward… and tonight, it’s closed. You could try the aqueduct. South of the bridge there’s a… colorful district. Dangerous, certainly — but do you have a choice?
*coughs hard* That aqueduct leads straight to the Ward. It’s not somewhere anyone would choose to tread… but no one escapes this night without risk.

Don’t concern yourself with me anymore. I can’t do much now… but take this. I never had the chance to use it well. Yharnam’s blood gave me hope, bought me time. Even if death comes… I remain human. *coughing*
*weak coughing* Why… me… why…? Dear gods… what have I done… Save me… please… save… me…
